I'm a bit confused as to why some of the code is in device\_base\_class.py. This seems to be a change to how we manage the display of output from workers, which are managed by tab\_base\_classes.py \(and indeed the ui file used directly by tab\_base\_classes is the one you've modified\). The base class should really be able to be subclassed directly, without needing to use `DeviceTab`. If it's just about save/restore of data, maybe we need to include something along those lines in `Tab` so that this change can be entirely contained within tab\_base\_classes.py

I suspect that change would also result in this pull request becoming compatible with the plugin tabs pull request.
